<title level="1" pfs="">[Afziaka Brute](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2359)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

An afziaka brute arises from a horse, bull, or other large animal.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Afziaka Brute](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2359)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #185: A Taste of Ashes](/Sources.aspx?ID=188) pg. 82</row>

**Perception** +12; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +16, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -3
</row>

**Grave-Bound Guts** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) While within 100 feet of its [vrykolakas's](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=159) burial ground, an afziaka appears in the natural shape it had when it was a regular animal and can eat normally. When farther away, it doesn't gain sustenance from eating food and eventually starves to death.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 120

**Immunities**
[disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +17,
**Damage** 2d10+9 piercing plus hunger pangs

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hoof +17,
**Damage** 2d8+7 bludgeoning

**Hunger Pangs**  ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) A creature damaged by the afziaka's fangs must succeed at a DC 22 Fortitude save or become [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for 1 minute. The creature can remove this condition earlier by consuming at least a handful of raw meat.

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Medium or smaller, hoof, DC 23

</column>
